title: ssh connector broken on crippled FS

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

labels.name: crippled-filesystems
labels.description: Issue concerned with operation on crippled filesystems, regardless of OS

body:
Happened with gh-4708 running on an exFAT SSD.

```
======================================================================
ERROR: datalad.support.tests.test_sshconnector.test_ssh_copy
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/mih/env/datalad3-dev/lib/python3.7/site-packages/nose/case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 187, in newfunc
    return func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 262, in newfunc
    return func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 715, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 715, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 715, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/support/tests/test_sshconnector.py", line 219, in test_ssh_copy
    togetfile.write_text(str('something'))
  File "/usr/lib/python3.7/pathlib.py", line 1225, in write_text
    with self.open(mode='w', encoding=encoding, errors=errors) as f:
  File "/usr/lib/python3.7/pathlib.py", line 1193, in open
    opener=self._opener)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.7/pathlib.py", line 1046, in _opener
    return self._accessor.open(self, flags, mode)
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/media/mih/Samsung_T5/tmp/datalad_temp_test_ssh_copy0ertf7ow.c opy/2|g>e"t.t&x;t'

======================================================================
ERROR: datalad.support.tests.test_sshconnector.test_ssh_open_close
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/mih/env/datalad3-dev/lib/python3.7/site-packages/nose/case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 187, in newfunc
    return func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 262, in newfunc
    return func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 714, in newfunc
    with make_tempfile(wrapped=t, **tkwargs) as filename:
  File "/usr/lib/python3.7/contextlib.py", line 112, in __enter__
    return next(self.gen)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/utils.py", line 1789, in make_tempfile
    else filename.write_text)(content)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.7/pathlib.py", line 1225, in write_text
    with self.open(mode='w', encoding=encoding, errors=errors) as f:
  File "/usr/lib/python3.7/pathlib.py", line 1193, in open
    opener=self._opener)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.7/pathlib.py", line 1046, in _opener
    return self._accessor.open(self, flags, mode)
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/media/mih/Samsung_T5/tmp/datalad_temp_test_ssh_open_closety9bp7g8 "`suffix:;& '
```
